answerText: Leo Nikolayevich Tolstoy[10] In this Tolstoy story, a foe of milk‐vessels proposes to the cook Ustinya but falls off the roof and dies before the marriage.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Editors 1 | 15 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One of this author's stories contrasts the dutiful Captain Khlopov with the vainglorious Lieutenant Rosencranz, and another discusses a war with Imam Shamil in which the title character makes multiple defections. For 10 points each: [10] Name this author of the short stories "The Raid" and "Hadji Murad."
